DeviceUpdater - Class in dev
The updater thread which periodically refreshes the online devices list by pinging the nameserver.
DeviceUpdater(Device, Device) - Constructor for class dev.DeviceUpdater
Construct a new object with the given nameserver and local device.
deviceUpdater - Variable in class dev.MetadataUpdater
The current list of devices.
DeviceUpdater.Listener - Interface in dev
The Listener interface allows dispatching event to listener object when a new device is detected as online.
